output.dependency: The type of beer described by the second column (beer name) determines and relates closely to the style of beer specified in the third column (beer style). Their values reflect a semantic dependency as each beer name is associated with its specific style.

The volume of the beer indicated in the fourth column shows a pattern that may correlate to the alcohol content in the fifth column. For instance, different volumes may typically correspond to varying levels of alcohol percentage.
The brewery name in the eighth column is tied to the location in the ninth column. This indicates a semantic dependency where all entries from the same brewery will originate from the same city.

The city indicated in the ninth column suggests a context that is validated by the state shown in the tenth column. This indicates a semantic dependency as each city would correspond to its respective state.
